Text:
Video seems very pixelated for the  bit rate .. with artifacts around edges of peoples heads and bodies ... 
Setting post processing to 6 in VLC helps ... but i have other star trek vidz, smaller file size and bitrate, same resolution, which do not suffer these symptoms, and are perfect to watch without VLC post processing ... 

I'm going to try download a better conversion of this movie

PS - i should mention with regards to my 1st comment .. the video is still very watchable ...

Its just my preference .. i know it can look far nicer and sharper, and still result in smaller filesize
